comments:
CDT 2.0.1  200407161531  Eclipse 200407150800

Steps:
1) Open a project
2) Create a configuration and debug it (goes to Debug perspective)
3) Go to the C/C++ perspective
4) Close the project
5) Go back to the Debug perspective and press "Continue".
